name: Gaggle
description:
A duck simulation Game.Lowpoly style, play as a laid-back duck in the pond!  You can fall in love with other ducks and hatch ducklings.  Catch the fish and feast! Pay attention to the duck net traps and energy value, if energy is low remember to go home to sleep ！

 Suggest a full-screen.

Unstable:You'll experience ducklings wobbling on unstable water, unstable swimming fish, and energy values that become unstable once you leave the nest.
